content.rendered:
PAL Aerospace is a diversified international aerospace and defence company headquartered in Canada. With over four decades of operations, we have continuously built on our experience to evolve into a global leader of airborne intelligence, surveillance and reconnaissance (ISR) solutions.

 

 

PAL Aerospace Address, Phone, Email, Working hours

Address: St. John’s International Airport, Hangar 1
PO Box 29030
St. John’s, NL, Canada A1A 5B5

Phone: +1-855-576-3948

Email: contact@palaerospace.com

Halifax

Address: Halifax Stanfield
International Airport
647 Barnes Drive.
Halifax, NS, Canada
B2T 1K3

Phone: +1-855-576-3948
Email: contact@palaerospace.com

Ottawa

Address: Constitution Square Tower 1
360 Albert Street, Suite 1810
Ottawa, ON, Canada
K1R 7X7

Phone: +1-613-900-8596, +1-855-576-3948
Email: contact@palaerospace.com

Toronto

Address: 7681 Hwy. 27, Unit 1,2,3
Vaughan ON Canada
L4L 4M5

Phone: +1-905-405-1371
Email: contact@palaerospace.com

Trinidad & Tobago

Address: Piarco International Airport
Piarco, Trinidad & Tobago,
West Indies

Phone: +1-855-576-3948
Email: ​​​contact@palaerospace.com

Curaçao

Address: Coast Guard Airstation, Hato, Plaza Margareth z/n
Willemstad, Curaçao

Phone: +1-855-576-3948
Email: contact@palaerospace.com

UAE

Address: PAL Aerospace Services Aircraft Maintenance LLC
Abu Dhabi, UAE
PO Box 114018

Phone: +1-855-576-3948
Email: contact@palaerospace.com

PAL Aerospace Official website: https://palaerospace.com/en/

Types of Planes / Air craft available with PAL Aerospace 

  • Beechcraft Super King Air B200
  • Beechcraft Super King Air B300
  • Bombardier Challenger 604
  • Cessna Citation II S550
  • Cessna Citation X 750
  • Dassault Falcon 900EX
  • de Havilland Canada DHC-2 MK3
  • Gulfstream G280

Queries handled by PAL Aerospace Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the PAL Aerospace Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the PAL Aerospace : (click on the stars below)
